basics.name: Mochi ZHANG
basics.label: Robotics Postgraduate & Full-Stack Developer
basics.summary: Postgraduate student majoring in Robotics at the University of Manchester, UK. He studied Software Engineering during his undergraduate studies and has built a solid technical foundation. In terms of technical capabilities, he is proficient in full-stack development: he can independently develop interfaces for web pages and applications on the front-end, and build logical architectures independently on the back-end. Meanwhile, he has systematic practical experience in the entire software development process and design patterns.

work.name: Tianjin Aiying Technology Co., Ltd. (IBM-ETP Training Base)
work.description: Technology company focusing on IT training and software development
work.position: Java Back-end Program Development Trainee & Group Project Leader
work.summary: Engaged in Java back-end development and led team project implementation, focusing on system function development and security optimization
highlights: Used IDE tools to build SpringBoot framework, integrated Mybatis-plus, and implemented basic database CRUD operations
Solved Nurse Rostering Problem (NRP) using greedy algorithm and branch-and-bound method, realizing personalized scheduling function
Implemented image storage by applying OSS and Redis, and configured related dependencies and service interfaces
Combined Sa-token and Redis to achieve dual-token triple authentication, enhancing system security
Responsible for team management, task assignment and progress supervision

work.name: Hegang Digital Technology Joint-Stock Limited Company
work.description: Digital technology enterprise focusing on industrial data management and intelligent detection
work.summary: Participated in the development of industrial production data systems and intelligent detection solutions, focusing on efficiency improvement and carbon reduction
highlights: Contributed to the development of industrial production data collection, management methods and carbon accounting systems
Assisted in building micro-target detection methods for real-time monitoring and micro-defect detection methods for edge equipment deployment
Optimized energy-intensive equipment to reduce idle time and improve energy efficiency, expecting 15-20% carbon emission reduction
Improved inspection accuracy to over 95%, increasing efficiency by 70% compared with traditional manual inspection

work.name: Tianjin Ruochuang Ruantong Technology Co., Ltd.
work.description: Software company specializing in back-end development and system testing
work.position: Java Back-end Program Development Trainee & Group Project Leader
work.summary: Led the team in back-end framework construction, interface development and performance testing, focusing on high-concurrency scenarios
highlights: Led the team to build SpringBoot framework, compile and test back-end interfaces, and design databases
Used IDE tools to build SpringBoot framework, integrated Mybatis-plus, and implemented basic database CRUD operations
Configured various script parameters with JMeter to conduct functional and system stress testing
Set up Redis cluster to implement distributed caching, and used JMeter for stress testing under high concurrency
Applied NATAPP to expose local ports to the public network, implemented Alipay sandbox simulation, tested payment API and processed return values

work.name: Tianjin Zhongruan Zhuoyue Information Technology Co., Ltd.
work.description: IT enterprise focusing on web front-end development and responsive service implementation
work.summary: Engaged in web front-end development, focusing on environment construction and responsive function realization
highlights: Built basic HTML environment with Hbuilder and implemented CSS and JS file development
Realized responsive front-end services using Vue.js, configured global navigation guards with 'router' and performed asynchronous route interception via 'router.beforeEach'

courses: Application of Internet of Things Technology
highlights: Proficient in technical tools: JAVA, C/C++, Python, Git, Maven, Springboot, MyBatis, MySQL, Apache Ajax, HTML5, Magicube Framework
Familiar with design software: Adobe Photoshop, Premiere, After Effects

projects.name: Development of Virtual Fitting Technology Based on Intangible Cultural Heritage Clothing
projects.description: Major Project of China National University Student Innovation & Entrepreneurship Development Program, focusing on virtual fitting platform development for intangible cultural heritage clothing
highlights: Developed an integrated intangible cultural heritage clothing platform with virtual fitting technology, supporting cloud computing, real-time dynamic simulation and personalized customization
Realized dynamic matching between virtual clothing and avatars using generator and discriminator game models, enhancing virtual fitting realism
Processed multi-position virtual fitting via Generative Adversarial Networks (GAN) to ensure natural transitions of virtual clothing in different poses
Obtained user facial information through mobile phone front camera and combined with 3D modeling technology to generate accurate virtual models
Enhanced clothing texture details and visual effects using computer vision technology
Provided immersive virtual fitting experience through Virtual Reality (VR) and Augmented Reality (AR) technologies
Supported team in building 3D body models with 3Ds Max and completing clothing modeling & simulation with APEX Clothing
Assisted in handling high concurrency requirements of the virtual fitting system and conducting complex calculations

projects.name: Multi-Functional Intelligent Street Light Pioneer Based on IoT Sensing
projects.description: Academic project focusing on IoT-based intelligent street light system development, integrating urban management and traffic monitoring functions
highlights: Built a data visualization platform to realize traffic flow analysis, emergency command, key vehicle scheduling, urban law enforcement and urban lighting system optimization
Integrated AI technology for traffic flow prediction, route planning and target detection
Optimized target detection network using deep learning algorithms (e.g., YOLOv8) to improve target recognition and tracking accuracy in complex environments
Enhanced traffic information positioning accuracy by combining GPS and WiFi, ensuring accurate transmission of vehicle location and road condition data
Used sensors and cameras for real-time collection of environmental and traffic data (e.g., traffic conditions, pollutant concentrations)
Assisted in hardware acceleration platform construction, multi-sensor data integration, smart city data visualization, energy-saving dimming and cloud-5G-IoT integration
